q1: Has the Mexico soccer team suffered from an injury?
a1: I don;t think there is a team in history that hasn't suffered from some injuries.  Thats why roster depth and experience is so important, especially in tournament play
q2: What is the worst injury any of their players had ever suffered?
a2: some players even dropped dead because of injury!
q3: Has a mexican player already died on the field?
a3: Mexican forward Orozco dies at age 29 after battle with lung cancer
q4: Who is the current coach of Mexico?
a4: Juan Carlos Osorio Arbeláez is the coach now for Mexico.
